Lucky Marvel Snap Turn 6
This is the highest score in a single location I have ever reached. I'm pretty proud though it was mostly luck. I do like the Wong + Leader finisher combo!I'm still not sure about the math.#MarvelSnap

Lucky Marvel Snap Turn 6

This is the highest score in a single location I have ever reached. I'm pretty proud though it was mostly luck. I do like the Wong + Leader finisher combo!

I'm still not sure about the math.
